title: Garry Allen
text: Garry Allen (born 11 August 1945) is a New Zealand <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er. He played in three <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class</a> and three <a href="List%20A%20cricket">List A</a> matches for <a href="Wellington%20cricket%20team">Wellington</a> from 1976 to 1980.
